label: Digital Experience Manager
title: Digital Experience Manager
description: Owns the end-to-end digital customer experience across web, mobile, and app channels, responsible for conversion optimization, journey mapping, and experience testing.
responsibilities: Define and optimize digital customer journeys
Lead A/B testing and personalization programs
Manage customer journey mapping and friction analysis
Track and improve conversion rates and engagement metrics
traditionalWorkflow: Quarterly journey mapping workshops with sticky notes
Manual A/B test setup taking 2-4 weeks
Monthly analysis of conversion funnel in spreadsheets
Email-based coordination with tech and marketing teams
Reactive fixes to customer complaints about UX
agenticWorkflow: Real-time journey maps auto-generated from behavioral data
AI-suggested test hypotheses launched in hours
Continuous monitoring with automated friction detection
Proactive optimization based on predictive analytics
painPointsAddressed: Outdated journey maps disconnected from reality
Slow experimentation cycles limit learning velocity

label: Marketing Operations Manager
title: Marketing Operations Manager
description: Manages marketing technology stack, campaign execution, performance measurement, and marketing analytics to drive efficient customer acquisition and engagement.
responsibilities: Manage marketing automation and campaign platforms
Oversee marketing attribution and performance measurement
Track marketing KPIs and ROI across channels
agenticWorkflow: Automated campaign orchestration with AI optimization
Proactive campaign performance monitoring with alerts
Self-service marketing analytics for all stakeholders
painPointsAddressed: Manual campaign processes limit scale and speed
Siloed channel data prevents holistic optimization

label: Customer Care Lead
title: Customer Care Lead
description: Manages customer service operations, chatbot performance, agent productivity, and customer satisfaction across all support channels.
responsibilities: Oversee customer service operations and agent performance
Manage chatbot and conversational AI programs
Track customer satisfaction and resolution metrics
Optimize support workflows and knowledge base
Coordinate escalation and issue resolution processes
agenticWorkflow: Real-time VoC sentiment analysis and insights
Automated agent coaching based on interaction quality
painPointsAddressed: Manual processes can't scale with volume
